comments.text: Interesting historical piece on Hydrolab!  While insulation specifics aren't detailed, the challenges of long-term undersea habitation highlighted here – especially concerning human factors – are directly relevant to modern habitat design and my interest in underwater volcano exploration.  It's a good reminder of the legacy we build upon.
